question:
Maratha powers were divided during the time of Bajirao I. Which of the following matches of places with their respective Maratha powers is/ are correct?
1. Baroda- Gaekwad
2. Nagpur- Bhonsle
3. Indore- Holkar
4. Gwalior- Scindia
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Maratha powers were divided into five parts during the time of Bajirao I. Those are Baroda- Gaekwad, Nagpur- Bhonsle, Indore- Holkar, Gwalior- Scindia, Poona- Peshwa.
